data.title: Contact Us Form
data.text:
If you need help after a disaster, go to DisasterAssistance.gov.

If you need specific information about your case, please email us at askIA@fema.dhs.gov with these details so we can verify your identity.

Your full name

The address of the property damaged

Your current mailing address, if different

Your phone number

Just the last four digits of your Social Security number

Providing the last four digits of your Social Security number and other information is optional. However, if you choose not to provide this information, we cannot share specific case details or update your file by email. Instead, you will need to call the FEMA helpline at 1-800-621-3362.

Complete the Contact Form

* indicates required field.
